verses.verse: <S%G1096><s%> And It Came To Pass <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> Those Days <S%G1565><s%> Went Out <S%G1831><s%> A Degree <S%G1378><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> Caesar <S%G2541><s%> Augustus, <S%G828><s%> That Should Be Registered <S%G583><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Habitable World; <S%G3625><s%>
<S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> This Registration <S%G582><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Took Place <S%G1096><s%> When Was Governor <S%G2230><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Syria <S%G4947><s%> Quirinius. <S%G2958><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Went <S%G4198><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> To Be Registered, <S%G583><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To <S%G2398><s%> His Own City : <S%G4172><s%>

<S%G305><s%> And Went Up <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Nazareth <S%G3478><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judea, <S%G2449><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> A City <S%G4172><s%> , Of David <S%G1138><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Is Called <S%G2564><s%> Bethlehem, <S%G965><s%> Because <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1511><s%> Of His Being <S%G846><s%> Of The <S%G1537><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Family <S%G3965><s%> , Of David, <S%G1138><s%>

To Register Himself <S%G583><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Was Betrothed <S%G3423><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> , As Wife, <S%G1135><s%> She Being <S%G5607><s%> Great With Child. <S%G1471><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> And It Came To Pass <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The Time <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1511><s%> They Were <S%G846><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Were Fulfilled <S%G4130><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5088><s%> For Her Bringing Forth, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> She Brought Forth <S%G5088><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> Her Son <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Firstborn, <S%G4416><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wrapped In Swaddling Clothes <S%G4683><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Laid <S%G347><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Manger, <S%G5336><s%> Because <S%G1360><s%> <S%G3756><s%> There Was Not <S%G2258><s%> For Them <S%G846><s%> A Place <S%G5117><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Inn. <S%G2646><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Shepherds <S%G4166><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Country <S%G5561><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Same, <S%G846><s%> Lodging In The Fields <S%G63><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Keeping <S%G5442><s%> Watch <S%G5438><s%> <S%G3588><s%> By Night <S%G3571><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4167><s%> Their Flock; <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> An Angel <S%G32><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Stood By <S%G2186><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Shone Around <S%G4034><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Feared With <S%G5399><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> Great. <S%G3173><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G32><s%> Angel, <S%G3361><s%> Fear Not; <S%G5399><s%> , Behold <S%G2400><s%> For, <S%G1063><s%> I Announce Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Of Joy <S%G5479><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People; <S%G2992><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> Was Born <S%G5088><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> A Saviour, <S%G4990><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Christ The <S%G5547><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Of David. <S%G1138><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> This Is <S%G5124><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sign : <S%G4592><s%> Ye Shall Find <S%G2147><s%> A Babe <S%G1025><s%> Wrapped In Swaddling Clothes, <S%G4683><s%> Lying <S%G2749><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Manger. <S%G5336><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Suddenly <S%G1810><s%> There Was <S%G1096><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> A Multitude <S%G4128><s%> Of The Host <S%G4756><s%> Heavenly, <S%G3770><s%> Praising <S%G134><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Glory <S%G1391><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Highest <S%G5310><s%> To God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> Peace, <S%G1515><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Good Pleasure. <S%G2107><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Came To Pass, <S%G1096><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Departed <S%G565><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angels, <S%G32><s%> That <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Shepherds <S%G4166><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> Let Us Go Through <S%G1330><s%> Indeed <S%G1211><s%> As Far As <S%G2193><s%> Bethlehem, <S%G965><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let Us See <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4487><s%> This Thing <S%G5124><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Has Come To Pass <S%G1096><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Made Known <S%G1107><s%> To Us. <S%G2254><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Came <S%G2064><s%> Having Hasted <S%G4692><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , <S%G429><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Found <S%G5037><s%> Both Mary <S%G3137><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Babe <S%G1025><s%> Lying <S%G2749><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Manger. <S%G5336><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> And Having Seen, <S%G1161><s%> They Made Known Abroad <S%G1232><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Saying <S%G4487><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Had Been Told <S%G2980><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3813><s%> This Little Child. <S%G5127><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> Wondered <S%G2296><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The Things Which <S%G3588><s%> Had Been Spoken <S%G2980><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Shepherds <S%G4166><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Kept <S%G4933><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4487><s%> These Sayings, <S%G5023><s%> Pondering Them <S%G4820><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Her Heart. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Returned <S%G1994><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Shepherds, <S%G4166><s%> Glorifying <S%G1392><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Praising <S%G134><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> They Had Heard <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Seen, <S%G1492><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> It Was Said <S%G2980><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Were Fulfilled <S%G4130><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Eight <S%G3638><s%> For The <S%G3588><s%> Circumcising <S%G4059><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , <S%G3813><s%> Little Child, <S%G2532><s%> Was Called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> His Name <S%G846><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Which He <S%G3588><s%> Was Called <S%G2564><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Before <S%G4253><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Was Conceived <S%G4815><s%> He <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Womb. <S%G2836><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Were Fulfilled <S%G4130><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2512><s%> For Their Purification <S%G846><s%> According <S%G2596><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> , Of Moses, <S%G3475><s%> They Brought <S%G321><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> To Present <S%G3936><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%>

As <S%G2531><s%> It Has Been Written <S%G1125><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Of The Lord, <S%G2962><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Male <S%G730><s%> Opening <S%G1272><s%> A Womb <S%G3388><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Shall Be Called; <S%G2564><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Offer <S%G1325><s%> A Sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Said <S%G2046><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Of The Lord, <S%G2962><s%> A Pair <S%G2201><s%> Of Turtle Doves <S%G5167><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Young <S%G3502><s%> Of Pigeons. <S%G4058><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> There Was <S%G2258><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> Whose <S%G3739><s%> Name Was <S%G3686><s%> Simeon; <S%G4826><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G444><s%> This Man Was <S%G3778><s%> Just <S%G1342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pious; <S%G2126><s%> Waiting For The <S%G4327><s%> Consolation <S%G3874><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Was <S%G2258><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Divinely Communicated <S%G5537><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G40><s%> Holy <S%G3361><s%> That He Should Not See <S%G1492><s%> Death <S%G2288><s%> <S%G4250><s%> Before <S%G2228><s%> He Should See <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Of The Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Came <S%G2064><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple; <S%G2411><s%> <S%G2532><s%> And <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> When Brought In <S%G1521><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Parents <S%G1118><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Child <S%G3813><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4160><s%> That They Might Do <S%G846><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> What Had Become Customary <S%G1480><s%> By The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

Now <S%G3568><s%> Thou Lettest Go <S%G630><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> Thy Bondman, <S%G4675><s%> O Master, <S%G1203><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4487><s%> Thy Word, <S%G4675><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Peace; <S%G1515><s%>
For <S%G3754><s%> Have Seen <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3788><s%> Mine Eyes <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4992><s%> Thy Salvation, <S%G4675><s%>
Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Hast Prepared <S%G2090><s%> Before The <S%G2596><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Peoples; <S%G2992><s%>
A Light <S%G5457><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Revelation <S%G602><s%> Of The Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G2992><s%> Of Thy People <S%G4675><s%> Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> His Mother <S%G846><s%> Wondering <S%G2296><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The Things Which <S%G3588><s%> Were Spoken <S%G2980><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Simeon, <S%G4826><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> His Mother, <S%G846><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> This Child <S%G3778><s%> Is Set <S%G2749><s%> For The <S%G1519><s%> Fall <S%G4431><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Rising Up <S%G386><s%> Of Many <S%G4183><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Israel, <S%G2474><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> A Sign <S%G4592><s%> Spoken Against; <S%G483><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> Of Thee <S%G4675><s%> Also <S%G1161><s%> Thy <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Soul <S%G5590><s%> Shall Go Through <S%G1330><s%> A Sword; <S%G4501><s%> <S%G3704><s%> So That <S%G302><s%> May Be Revealed <S%G601><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Hearts The <S%G2588><s%> Reasonings. <S%G1261><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> There Was <S%G2258><s%> Anna <S%G451><s%> A Prophetess, <S%G4398><s%> Daughter <S%G2364><s%> Of Phanuel, <S%G5323><s%> Of The <S%G1537><s%> Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Of Asher, <S%G768><s%> She <S%G846><s%> <S%G3778><s%> Was Advanced <S%G4260><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Many, <S%G4183><s%> Having Lived <S%G2198><s%> Years <S%G2094><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> A Husband <S%G435><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3932><s%> Her Virginity, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> She Was <S%G846><s%> <S%G3778><s%> A Widow <S%G5503><s%> About <S%G5613><s%> Years <S%G2094><s%> Of Eighty - Four, <S%G3589><s%> <S%G5064><s%> , Who <S%G3739><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Departed <S%G868><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G2411><s%> With Fastings <S%G3521><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Supplications <S%G1162><s%> Serving <S%G3000><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Day : <S%G2250><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> She <S%G846><s%> <S%G3778><s%> At The Same <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> Coming Up <S%G2186><s%> Gave Praise <S%G437><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> , Lord, <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Waiting For <S%G4327><s%> Redemption <S%G3085><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G5613><s%> They Had Completed <S%G5055><s%> All Things <S%G537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> They Returned <S%G5290><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Their Own, <S%G846><s%> Nazareth. <S%G3478><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And The <S%G1161><s%> Little Child <S%G3813><s%> Grew, <S%G837><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Became Strong <S%G2901><s%> , In Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> Being Filled <S%G4137><s%> With Wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>
